column4: When partitioning a disk for dual boot, how do I indicate which partition is the "swap" partition?
I need to make two paritions though, correct? one for root and one for swap?
after you designate partition sizes and types, it'll come up to a screen where you can designate whcich partitions are which, and whether to format them or not,
swap partition basically does the job of the pagefile in windoze
